definition: to accept/to take/next/following
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: The police report described, in horrifying detail, the nightmare that followed.
sentences.chinese: 警方卷宗描述了接下來發生的噩夢，令人戰慄的細節。

sentences.english: We will explore this concept in the next section.
sentences.chinese: 我們在接下來的部分探究這個概念。

sentences.english: At the next meeting, there was a9)split in the club membership.
sentences.chinese: 在接下來的會議裏，俱樂部成員之間出現了意見分歧。

sentences.english: It's a theme that we'll see coming up in many of the stories.
sentences.chinese: 在接下來的很多故事中，我們都可以看到這個主題。

sentences.english: I held my breath, not knowing what to expect.
sentences.chinese: 我屏住呼吸，不明白接下來會發生什麼。

sentences.english: Next, you need to analyse the metrics.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，你需要分析這個矩陣。

sentences.english: The next generation of groupware tools focused on these communications problems.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的一代羣件工具是以通信問題爲重點的。

sentences.english: Berlusconi was taken to hospital with blood smeared over his face after a man hurled a small model of Milan cathedral at him at a political rally, police said on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，他臉帶血漬，被送往了醫院。

sentences.english: So that efficiency is something less than one, and we'd like to figure out what that is.
sentences.chinese: 因此效率肯定小於一，接下來解釋這是爲什麼。

sentences.english: The next hip-hop dance move is to extend the right foot out.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的嘻哈舞步，是擴大了右腳。

sentences.english: The next step is to harvest the selected classes from the auto-generated class diagram.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的一步是從自動生產類圖中總結選擇的類。

sentences.english: Hello and welcome to Trend UK, your shortcut to popular culture from the British Council. In the next few minutes we’re going to be talking about modern manners.
sentences.chinese: 在接下來的幾分鐘裏，我們將要討論的是現代禮儀。

sentences.english: The next few months passed in a blur.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的幾個月混混沌沌地過去。

sentences.english: Next, I build a state machine, step by step.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，我將逐步構建一個狀態機。

sentences.english: Next I smudged the yellow to start forming the random sections of color where the gradient will go.
sentences.chinese: 接下來我對色彩發生隨機漸變的部分進行模糊處理。

sentences.english: The following weeks went by in a whirl.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的幾周飛一樣的過去。

definition: to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
termination/to finish/to end/to conclude/to close
the next one
in a word/in short/in brief
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
the past few days
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
after the event
will/shall/to be going to
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
to arrive/arrival/advent
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
perhaps/maybe
we/us/ourselves/our
